amendment.description: Amendment prohibits cash and precious metal payments to designated state sponsors of terrorism and North Korea in addition to Iran.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 114-781 to prohibit cash and precious metal payments to designated state sponsors of terrorism and North Korea in addition to Iran.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Duffy amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Duffy.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Duffy amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
